Description:
Big turret, does moderate amount of damage.
Class: Machine.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Determines orientation of the mounted turret- floor or ceiling.

keyChoices.choiceDescription: If selected, turrets can auto-activate themselfes when enemy is in their LoS.
Start disabled, ignore environment until triggered.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Time to auto-deactivation when no enemies tracked.
Rate of turret rotating when navigating enemies.
Range of firing. Note that too high values may not be supported.
